title: Uf-oh
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School, John Bird and Glenn Melenhorst
brief_description: Adrian (voice by Egan Gill) is quietly working on his computer, but his trusty companion, a bandicoot named Openhiemer (voice by Paul Gherig), has other plans. Openheimer meddles with the computers and taps into some alien life, causing all sorts of mischief.
